title: Drawing, May 1853
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at various locations:  road / grass/ red / path / weed / little purple flowers at top; and the date; and again,  at top right:  Church etc. at Mampox from the cemetery; and at bottom center: N - E
description: Horizontal view of a receding street flanked by low houses with straw or grass roofs, in the foreground, by stately stone buildings, one of which has a tower with a flat top in the distance.  The tops of the steeple and of the roof of the church rise in the left middle distance over trees.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, May 1853.
May 1853. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-63.
